explainers.title: What are the main types of tariffs and charges
explainers.prose:
The table below lists the customs duties that apply to the import of commodity {commodity}.

Use our tariff duty calculator to work out the duties and taxes applicable to the import of commodity {commodity}.
explainers.prose_ni:
The table below lists the customs duties that apply to the import of commodity {commodity}.

Use our tariff duty calculator to work out the duties and taxes applicable to the import of commodity {commodity}.

explainers.title: More information about quotas
explainers.prose:
Quotas allow a limited amount of goods to be imported at a lower duty rate. Once the quota has been used up, you will revert to the out-of-quota rate, which may be the third-country duty or a preferential rate.

Quotas can be non-preferential (open to many countries) or preferential (restricted to a particular trading partner).

remedies.block: Trade remedies, safeguards and retaliatory duties
remedies.block_xi: Trade remedies, safeguards and retaliatory duties

explainers.title: More information about trade remedies and safeguards
explainers.prose: World Trade Organization rules prevent artificially cheap imports from damaging markets. This guide explains how anti-dumping duties and 'countervailing' (or anti-subsidy) measures work.
explainers.prose_ni: World Trade Organization rules prevent artificially cheap imports from damaging markets. This guide explains how anti-dumping duties and 'countervailing' (or anti-subsidy) measures work.

Check how to import or export goods

Now you have identified your commodity code, you can check how to import commodity {commodity} from {country_name}.

explainers.prose_ni: Check how to move goods into and out of Northern Ireland.

explainers.prose: Explicitly UK - Import controls can be either prohibitions, where goods cannot be imported under any circumstances, or restrictions, where goods can be imported only under certain circumstances.
explainers.prose_ni: If you are bringing goods into Northern Ireland from outside of the UK and the European Union, you will need to ensure that you adhere to UK import controls.

explainers.xprose: You will need to abide by the measures listed below to get your goods out of the UK - does not really work for supplementary units
